gameworld.tile

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.tile.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildingTile, EntranceTile, FloorTile

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Tile represents a square in a location. A tile may contain a Player or an Entity
    Author:
    Jasen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
